Feb 16, 2019 • 1 min read • ["game", "review", "laraan"]

img

The A E S T H I T I C of Laraan makes if very difficult to tell how far away things are, which is a bad thing for platforming. There’s also very floaty hit detection, like hit boxes are a ways outside of the physical objects; and the camera, which controls like it’s buoyantly moving through jelly, frequently jumps up close to the character which doesn’t let you see what’s in front of you. 

Post by: saturdayxiii
